overview: The film Alladista is being made simultaneously in Telugu and Tamil versions. Pen Singam is the Tamil title of this movie. Meera Jasmine plays the female lead in the movie Alladista which is a romantic cum action entertainer. Surya's friend Nagendran demands a dowry from his wife Mythilli after marriage. When Surya learns about this, he tries to help Mythilli but is framed for her murder instead.
title: Alladista
